Assigning credit for academic work is tricky, and the first/last author distinct has itâ€™s particular weaknesses. Here i list all academic papers for which i have contributed work, and i explain what i did for each project.

Published articles

1. Genetics of age at onset in major depression

This was my first project as a RA, a project that grew out from my bachelor thesis. I wrote all research code, wrote the paper (with input from my supervisor). Code is available here.

2. Genetic heterogeneity and subtypes of major depression

For this paper i gave technical support. I got the fastGWA software setup, generated the genetic relatedness matrix for UKB (N=457k) for our local compute cluster. I also assisted with setting up HDL on the compute cluster, and provided sample scripts for running HDL over several phenotypes. Lastly, i reviewed the majority of the research code.
